description: Uses Docling to process input documents connecting to your instance of Docling Serve.

api_url.info: URL of the Docling Serve instance.

max_concurrency.info: Maximum number of concurrent requests for the server.

max_poll_timeout.info: Maximum waiting time for the document conversion to complete (in seconds).

api_headers.info: Optional dictionary of additional headers required for connecting to Docling Serve.

docling_serve_opts.info: Optional dictionary of additional options. See https://github.com/docling-project/docling-serve/blob/main/docs/usage.md for more information.

errors.processing_timeout: Processing time {processing_time}s exceeds the maximum poll timeout {max_poll_timeout}s. Please increase the max_poll_timeout parameter or review why the processing takes long on the server.
errors.too_many_http_errors: The status requests got HTTP response {status_code} too many times (max retries: {max_retries}).
errors.task_failed: Document conversion task {task_id} failed on the server.

logs.no_json_content: No JSON DoclingDocument found in the result.
logs.starting_processing: Starting processing of {count} file(s) with max concurrency {concurrency}
logs.skipping_no_path: Skipping file at index {index} - No path provided
logs.waiting_for_results: Waiting for results from {count} conversion task(s)
